name: Beast League
summary:
A multiplayer sports battle arena where you can defy gravity! Compete in fast-paced 2-minute airborne matches and unlock powerful Beasts with unique super powers.
Experience the first mode of Beast League: Basketball. The ultimate mobile PvP multiplayer basketball game! Control your shots with precision and make insane dunks and layups as you dominate the court. Defy gravity with Nitro Boots, fly and spin in the air as you outplay and defeat your enemy.
Unlock and upgrade a variety of Beasts unique play styles and ultimate abilities! Collect awesome skins to stand out in the field. Battle until the last Beast stands, each time you score your enemy loses HP!
